message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the creation and release of a corpus for improving the quality and relational abilities of Intelligent Virtual Agents (IVAs) in the domains of travel and telecommunications. The paper discusses the annotation of the corpus to determine the classes of language present in the highlighted sections such as the presence of Greetings, Backstory, Justification, Gratitude, Rants, or Emotions. This work involves natural language processing, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, which are the main focus of the cs.CL (Computation and Language) sub-category. The paper also discusses the need for automated methods of discovering such language, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning). The paper also compares the usage of such language in human-human interactions on TripAdvisor forums, which involves information retrieval and web search, and thus falls under the scope of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
